root.name: Rockman EXE 4.5 Real Operation
root.description: Overview Rockman.EXE 4.5 is a spin-off of the Mega Man Battle Network series. It is a simulation game where NetNavis are controlled by the AI, with the players "slotting-in" BattleChips and issuing commands. It was made to be used with the BattleChip toys and BattleChip Gate accessory, which was almost certainly the cause of the title's Japan-exclusivity. The accessories are not required, but without them the game becomes much more difficult. Playable NavisThe game features MegaMan.EXE, the twelve Navis that contribute DoubleSouls in Mega Man Battle Network 4, and other miscellaneous Navis. Several of the Navis in the latter category would later become playable in Battle Network 5 and 6. On the PET screen, the background music is a remix of the chosen Navi's Classic series stage theme (if applicable). Available at the start: MegaMan.EXE Roll.EXE GutsMan.EXE NumberMan.EXE Can be unlocked from normal gameplay: FireMan.EXEWindMan.EXE SearchMan.EXEThunderMan.EXE AquaMan.EXE MetalMan.EXE WoodMan.EXE ProtoMan.EXEJunkMan.EXE Requires Battle Chip Gate with proper NaviChip: IceMan.EXE ElecMan.EXE ShadowMan.EXE NapalmMan.EXE KnightMan.EXE PlantMan.EXEStarMan.EXE Bass.EXE
